title: Is TechCroz.com genuine for data entry jobs? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I search ‘techcroz review’ on the search page. I got this result (below image)  And I check many other sites and also techcroz’s site. I found many users do complain about this site. They had a bad experience. And also the company is not registered with CIN No. So I can’t find it’s a genuine company. or maybe I’m wrong but you must do double check before any decision. Thanks
